metadata.title: CVE-2023-26136 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Versions of the package tough-cookie before 4.1.3 are vulnerable toPrototype Pollution due to improper handling of Cookies when usingCookieJar in rejectPublicSuffixes=false mode. This issue arises from themanner in which the objects are initialized.

criterions.comment: node-tough-cookie package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
